name: places/ChIJzf_EIWb2wokRbcPs9_2wIH8
adrFormatAddress: 3345 Broadway, New York, NY 10031-7402, USA

originalText.text:
The tailor "Versace" and the manager of the shop, Fernando are great.

Kind, professional and always willing to help.

Great tailoring work.

They even shorten dress shirt sleeves which is a hard to find service from tailors.

Cash only.

text.text:

originalText.text: Every experience I have had here, has been great! Thank you!

text.text: Every experience I have had here, has been great! Thank you!

originalText.text: Destroyed my designer shirt, I got it back with holes poked in the bottom, and new stains on it.  They are rude and disrespectful to customers and their clothes.   Stay away if you value your clothing.   Never minded that you have to pay cash before the service is provided.   What’s with that.

text.text: Destroyed my designer shirt, I got it back with holes poked in the bottom, and new stains on it.  They are rude and disrespectful to customers and their clothes.   Stay away if you value your clothing.   Never minded that you have to pay cash before the service is provided.   What’s with that.

originalText.text: I had taken a dress there and asked for 4 areas to be altered. They wrote the four changes on the ticket and charged me $45. When I came back to pick up the dress, I paid the $45 and they took my ticket. But when I went home to try it on, I found they had only done 2 of the 4 areas I had been charged for. When I returned and pointed this out, they told me to come back next week when the tailor was in. When I came back the next week, they denied that they did not finish the job, and wanted to charge me an extra $30 to do one more alteration, but still refused to do the fourth, that they had agreed to initially. I left. I will never go back. And unless you can fight with them in Spanish when the screw you over, you should take your business elsewhere too.

originalText.text: Over priced my coat to be cleaned. At that my coat came out smaller    So I payed them $40 to shrink my coat. Unbelievable.   I could of washed my own coat if I would of imagined my coat being treated as if they did not care to clean my wear.    Terrible.   Never coming back to this place.
